results.title: Career soldier
results.brief_description: Shows the transformation from civilian to soldier at Kapooka in New South Wales, and describes the life of a modern career soldier. His uniforms are tailor-made, he reaches a new peak of physical fitness, he is encouraged to raise his educational level, he is better fed and better housed than ever before, he is trained in specialist skills and paid accordingly.

results.title: Career package
results.creator_credit: Ted Robinson, Eve Ash and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description: Consist of three programmes suitable for use in a work education programm. 1. “The job interview”. 2. “Getting there-getting where. 3. “Study Tips”. These titles are also available as individual titles.

results.title: Career in retail selling: who threw that monkey wrench?

results.title: Career in retail selling. No. 8. Success story [B&W]
results.brief_description: Set in a fashion department we meet a would-be writer, Miss Barry, who has been with the store for one year. In her conversation with another sales clerk, Mimsy, she emphasizes the benefits of being familiar with the stock and with reading trade magazines to keep up on new trends. Miss Barry gets a promotion to assistant fashion buyer and Mimsy is hired. Her contact with Miss Barry convinces her that she too can have a career in retail selling.

results.title: Career as a chartered accountant
results.creator_credit: Tony Wellington, Garry Blackledge and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: This film provides an indication of the qualifications necessary to become a chartered accountant and then looks at the various avenues open after completion of studies. Suitable for secondary school level.

results.title: Care: the wonder drug
results.creator_credit: Paul McCollough, William F Aull, MTI Teleprograms and S William Hinzman Films
results.brief_description: A dramatised case history of drug misuse by Jackie, a senior citizen. This films is designed to teach prescription and non-prescription drug users the consequences of not taking care with drugs.
